trans-unit.source: Represents an abstract class that defines an action to be executed if the associated <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.Condition" /> evaluates to <see langword="true" />, for <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions" />, or <see langword="false" />, for <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma classe abstrata que define uma ação a ser executada se a <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.Condition" /> associada é avaliada como <see langword="true" /> para <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions" /> ou como <see langword="false" /> para <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions" />.

trans-unit.source: This class must be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe deve ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> objects (which can be used as both <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A>) typically set a variable value on one of the properties of the activity, call a method of the activity, or call static methods on types in referenced assemblies.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> objetos (que pode ser usado como <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A>) normalmente definir um valor de variável em uma das propriedades da atividade, chamar um método de atividade ou chamar métodos estáticos em tipos em assemblies referenciados.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction> is the base type that <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> classes derive from.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction> é o tipo base que <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction>, e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> derivam de classes.

trans-unit.source: The uses of these classes is as follows:
trans-unit.target: Os usos dessas classes é a seguinte:

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> modifies a property or calls a method.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> modifica uma propriedade ou chama um método.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction> causes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> to stop executing and returns control to the calling method.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction> faz com que o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> para interromper a execução e retorna o controle para o método de chamada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> explicitly indicates that a rule is updating a variable.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> explicitamente indica que uma regra está atualizando uma variável.

trans-unit.source: This causes the re-evaluation of any affected rules.
trans-unit.target: Isso faz com que a reavaliação de quaisquer regras afetadas.

trans-unit.source: The following code creates an action that can be used in rule sets.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir cria uma ação que pode ser usada em conjuntos de regras.

trans-unit.source: The action is named `Log`, and takes a single parameter, which must evaluate to a string.
trans-unit.target: A ação é denominada `Log`e usa um único parâmetro, que deve ser avaliada como uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: This action outputs the string to the Console.
trans-unit.target: Essa ação gera a cadeia de caracteres para o Console.

trans-unit.source: To use this code, add it to a Class Library project and reference the library from your workflow project.
trans-unit.target: Para usar esse código, adicione-a um projeto de biblioteca de classes e a biblioteca de referência do seu projeto de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia em profundidade do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> that is identical to this instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> que é idêntico a esta instância.

trans-unit.source: The runtime state that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> is executing in.
trans-unit.target: O tempo de execução de estado no qual o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> está em execução.

trans-unit.source: Executes the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Executa o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> usando a instância de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> that was used previously in a call to <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction.Validate(System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation)" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> que foi usado anteriormente em uma chamada para <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction.Validate(System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation)" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the fields and properties updated by a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna os campos e propriedades atualizadas por um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of strings that represent the names of fields and properties that are changed by a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de cadeias de caracteres que representa os nomes de propriedades e campos que são alterados por um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> para gerenciar o processo de validação.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> is configured correctly and has no errors.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> está configurado corretamente e não tem erros.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to show that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> validated correctly and has no errors; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para mostrar que a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> foi validada corretamente e não tem erros; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction> contains errors (the `Validate` method returns `false`), then <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> will contain the list of errors encountered.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction> contém erros (o `Validate` método retorna `false`), em seguida, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> conterá a lista de erros encontrados.
